subtitle: This dish is a meal by itself or serve with meat if preferred.

method.text: Heat the oil in a wok or large frying pan.
Add the mange-tout and beans to the pan. Saute for 2-3 min until softened. Add the Chinese leaves, carrot ribbons, beansprouts and garlic. Saute for 2 min.
Add the stock, seasoning and soy sauce. Bring to the boil and simmer gently for 5 min.

Meanwhile, cook the egg noodles in a pan of boiling water for 2-3 min until tender (or according to pack instructions). Drain thoroughly and stir into the vegetables. Adjust seasoning then spoon into warmed bowls.
Garnish with salad onions and serve immediately.

title: Chinese noodles with vegetables
